name: Trucktown: Grand Prix
description:
Roar your engine to the finish line in Trucktown: Grand Prix!

Race with your favorite Trucktown characters as you skid, swerve, and speed through each track to claim victory and win the tournament cups! Outsmart your opponents by collecting speed boosts, smashing into others, and outmaneuvering each racer.

• Compete in the Cup races or time trial modes!
• Race as your favorite Trucktown characters including Jack, Max, Dan, Big Rig, Gabby, and Pete!
• Collect powerups to speed by your opponents!
• Race through the city, construction, scrapyard, and pipe peak tracks!
